unpublishedAction.name: getUBOEntitiesDetails

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
OID,
CUSTOMER_OID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_BUSINESS_NAME,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_HOLD_PERC,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_CONST_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ISLISTED,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_NO,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_NAME,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_PLACE,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_RESID_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_ID,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_ACCOUNT_NO,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_CITY,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_STATE,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ZIP,
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_COUNTRY
FROM APS_CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITIES
WHERE 
OID = {{appsmith.store.editEntitiesOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = {{appsmith.store.customerOID}}

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
